name: Starsweeper - Adknown Games
description:
Welcome to Starsweeper. Touch an asteroid to reveal what's inside. Numbers represent the number of adjacent black holes. Successfully clear the star-field without triggering any black holes to win!

Starsweeper features two game modes, classic and frenzy.

In classic mode, your timer counts up, giving you unlimited time to clear the star-field.

In frenzy mode, your time counts down, so clear as many asteroids as you can within the time limit.
